languages.text: {n}Новая, незнакомая боль грозится поглотить вас, так что вы находите приют в боли старой и знакомой. Страдания, перенесенные в {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}прошлом{/d} и не сломившие вас, притупляют страдания в настоящем. Вы делаете шаг. Второй.{/n}

{n}A new, unfamiliar pain seeks to consume you, so you find sanctuary in the older, more familiar ache. The torment that you went through in the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}past{/d}, the torment that could not break you, eases your suffering in the present. You take a step and then another.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Новая, незнакомая боль грозится поглотить вас, так что вы находите приют в боли старой и знакомой. Страдания, перенесенные в {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}прошлом{/d} и не сломившие вас, притупляют страдания в настоящем. Вы делаете шаг. Второй.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A new, unfamiliar pain seeks to consume you, so you find sanctuary in the pain that is old and familiar. The torment that you went through in the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}past{/d}, the torment that could not break you, eases your suffering in the present. You take a step and then another.{/n}

{n}A new, unfamiliar pain seeks to consume you, so you find sanctuary in the pain that is old and familiar. {n}A new, unfamiliar pain seeks to consume you, so you find sanctuary in the older, more familiar ache. The torment that you went through in the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}past{/d}, the torment that could not break you, eases your suffering in the present. You take a step, followed by another, and another.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein neuer unbekannter Schmerz will dich verschlingen, also suchst du Zuflucht in vertrauteren Qualen. Das Leid, das du in der {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Vergangenheit{/d} erfahren hast, die Folter, die dich nicht brechen konnte, mildert deinen Schmerz in der Gegenwart. Du gehst einen Schritt und dann noch einen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A new, unfamiliar pain seeks to consume you, so you find sanctuary in the older, more familiar ache. The torment that you went through in the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}past{/d}, the torment that could not break you, eases your suffering in the present. You take a step and then another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein neuer unbekannter Schmerz will dich verschlingen, also suchst du Zuflucht in vertrauteren Qualen. Das Leid, das du in der {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Vergangenheit{/d} erfahren hast, die Folter, die dich nicht brechen konnte, mildert deinen Schmerz in der Gegenwart. Du gehst einen Schritt und dann noch einen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une nouvelle douleur d'origine inconnue cherche à vous consumer et vous pousse à vous réfugier dans le bon vieux calvaire auquel vous êtes {mf|habitué|habituée}. Les tourments que vous avez connus par le {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}passé{/d}, ceux qui n'ont pas réussi à vous briser, viennent soulager votre peine actuelle. Vous faites un pas, puis un autre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A new, unfamiliar pain seeks to consume you, so you find sanctuary in the older, more familiar ache. The torment that you went through in the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}past{/d}, the torment that could not break you, eases your suffering in the present. You take a step and then another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une nouvelle douleur d'origine inconnue cherche à vous consumer et vous pousse à vous réfugier dans le bon vieux calvaire auquel vous êtes {mf|habitué|habituée}. Les tourments que vous avez connus par le {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}passé{/d}, ceux qui n'ont pas réussi à vous briser, viennent soulager votre peine actuelle. Vous faites un pas, puis un autre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un dolor nuevo y desconocido intenta consumirte, así que te refugias en un dolor viejo y conocido. La tortura que superaste en el {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pasado{/d}, que no logró doblegarte, alivia tu sufrimiento presente. Das un paso al frente. Y luego otro más.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A new, unfamiliar pain seeks to consume you, so you find sanctuary in the older, more familiar ache. The torment that you went through in the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}past{/d}, the torment that could not break you, eases your suffering in the present. You take a step and then another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un dolor nuevo y desconocido intenta consumirte, así que te refugias en un dolor viejo y conocido. La tortura que superaste en el {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pasado{/d}, que no logró doblegarte, alivia tu sufrimiento presente. Das un paso al frente. Y luego otro más.{/n}

languages.text: {n}新たな、馴染みのない痛みがあなたを蝕もうとしてくる。だからこそ、より古い、馴染みのある苦痛の中に聖域を見出した。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}過去{/d}に経験した苦しみ、あなたを打ち砕けなかった受難が、今のあなたの苦しみを和らげてくれる。あなたは一歩を、そしてまた次の一歩を踏み出す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A new, unfamiliar pain seeks to consume you, so you find sanctuary in the older, more familiar ache. The torment that you went through in the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}past{/d}, the torment that could not break you, eases your suffering in the present. You take a step and then another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}新たな、馴染みのない痛みがあなたを蝕もうとしてくる。だからこそ、より古い、馴染みのある苦痛の中に聖域を見出した。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}過去{/d}に経験した苦しみ、あなたを打ち砕けなかった受難が、今のあなたの苦しみを和らげてくれる。あなたは一歩を、そしてまた次の一歩を踏み出す。{/n}

languages.text: {n}某种你并不熟悉的新痛苦试图吞噬你，但你却在更古老、更熟悉的痛苦中找到了安宁。你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}过去{/d}曾经历过无数折磨，那些折磨未能击垮你，此时此刻减轻了你当下的痛苦。你向前迈了一步，随后又迈出了另一步。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A new, unfamiliar pain seeks to consume you, so you find sanctuary in the older, more familiar ache. The torment that you went through in the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}past{/d}, the torment that could not break you, eases your suffering in the present. You take a step and then another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}某种你并不熟悉的新痛苦试图吞噬你，但你却在更古老、更熟悉的痛苦中找到了安宁。你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}过去{/d}曾经历过无数折磨，那些折磨未能击垮你，此时此刻减轻了你当下的痛苦。你向前迈了一步，随后又迈出了另一步。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aşina olmadığın yeni bir acı, seni tüketmenin bir yolunu arıyor. Sen de daha aşina olduğun eski bir acıya sığınıyorsun. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}Geçmişte{/d} katlandığın süre boyunca iradeni kırmaya başaramayan o eziyet, şu anda çektiğin acıları hafifletiyor. Bir adım atıyorsun, ardından diğer bir adım geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A new, unfamiliar pain seeks to consume you, so you find sanctuary in the older, more familiar ache. The torment that you went through in the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}past{/d}, the torment that could not break you, eases your suffering in the present. You take a step and then another.{/n}
